text:
75 years after FDR proposed an economic bill of rights, we must take up the unfinished business of the New Deal and carry it to completion.

Watch my speech at 2 pm ET: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ndD23MCDF_k&feature=youtu.be #DemocraticSocialism http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D83vjasXkAATDZt.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1138825683365507072/vid/480x270/Qe9FAKLApbWGX7IX.mp4?tag=13

3 years ago today, 49 people were murdered at Pulse during “Latin night.” As we mark Pride Month and Gun Violence Prevention Month, we vow to honor their memories, continue fighting to prevent gun violence, disarm hate, fight racism and homophobia, and always be #OrlandoUnited. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D84MBFTWwAA5ezg.jpg

Today, I introduced legislation to make the E-Verify program permanent. Congress should also continue work to find long term fixes to secure our border, update our asylum and trafficking laws, and institute mandatory E-Verify nationwide. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D84QHhTXUAUBQAL.jpg

There is an epidemic of violence against Native American women. Approximately 56% of Native women have experienced sexual violence in their lifetime & many women and girls are murdered or have gone missing. I've cosponsored Savanna's Act to commit resources to ending this crisis.

Last month, a 13-year record of 144,000 illegal immigrants were apprehended at the southern borders. Congress needs to act now to address our illegal immigration crisis by closing legal loopholes and removing the magnets—like illegal employment—that drive illegal immigration.

Let's be clear about so-called democratic socialism:

❌it's incompatible with our American values
❌it hasn't worked anywhere in the world
❌it will never be the answer

Watch me explain ⬇️ http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1138831709842096128/img/2v3YUVakDPKkZjQt.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1138831709842096128/vid/480x270/QtKEWQcYDAVro4N8.mp4?tag=13

At the end of the day, the 1 percent may have enormous wealth and power, but they are just the 1 percent. When the 99 percent stand together, we can transform society.
 
These are my values, and that is why I call myself a democratic socialist.  
#DemocraticSocialism

“Socialism is the epithet they have hurled at every advance the people have made in the last 20 years... Socialism is their name for almost anything that helps all the people.” –Harry Truman #DemocraticSocialism
Uncle Sam pays 22% of the NATO budget not counting the billions of dollars to deploy our soldiers for NATO missions. Globalists want to admit North Macedonia to NATO.

Our current economy isn’t working for many Americans which is why I have offered some important policy changes we need to make.

But “Democratic Socialism” isn’t the answer.

- The right to health care
- The right to education
- The right to a good job
- The right to affordable housing
- The right to a secure retirement
- The right to a clean environment

#DemocraticSocialism

Jon Stewart is right. Our first responders, many from New Jersey, responded to the 9/11 attacks in 5 seconds. 

In an instant, they made a sacrifice for our country for which we can never repay them. They did their jobs and it is time for Congress to start doing ours. https://twitter.com/NBCNews/status/1138483754438148098 QT @NBCNews Jon Stewart concludes his statement, urging Congress for more funding for the Sept. 11th Victim Compensation Fund, to a standing ovation.
 
"They responded [to 9/11 attacks] in 5 seconds. They did their jobs, with courage, grace, tenacity, humility ... 18 years later, do yours!" http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D8y1AxrWkAIulpj.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1138483500477222913/pu/vid/480x270/ymfZi1Bu_VgPVID7.mp4?tag=10
